headline: MKS INSTRUMENTS, INC. COMPACT NETWORK I/O
categories.lvl1: Vacuum Processing Equipment > Vacuum Process Instrumentation
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Process Instrumentation > Other Vacuum Instrumentation
specstable:
Manufacturer MKS Instruments
Model Macronode I/O
Description Compact Network I/O
Other Information Ethernet,RJ45 with Modbus/TCP
Four slot:
#1: DIDO
#2: COMBO
#3: COMBO
#4: COMBO

Model # AS00969-01

MacroNode™ Dimensions 4"H x 4"W x 1.5"D plus 0.7" per I/O slot I/O Connector 37-pin male D-sub Ethernet Connector 100 BaseT, RJ45 with EMI filter or Fiberoptic connector RS-232 Connector TXD, RXD; DB9 connector Weight 600g (1.32 lb) Operating Temperature 0 to +55C Storage -40 to +85C Humidity 5 to 95% non-condensing BUS Interface Ethernet - Modbus/TCP or Ethernet/IP; EtherCAT; DeviceNet Front Panel Indicators Network Status, Module Status, LINK, 100MB Rotary Switches IP address, operating mode (MacID and Rate for DeviceNet models) Input Powered from I/O connector +24VDC@120 mA Isolation Choke Filtering Card Specifications DIDO Card Number of Digital I/O 24 points (input or output) Digital Input Current Sinking: Active low - 1.5 mA min Current Sourcing: Active high - 1.5 mA min Digital Output Current Sinking: Active low, 200 mA max/channel Current Sourcing: Active high, 200 mA max/channel Current Max: 750 mA per 6 DO AIAO Card Analog Input 16 single-ended points (8 in differential mode) 14 bit Range (-10 to +10V) Analog Output 8 single-ended points 12 bit Range (-10 to +10V) 5mA/channel into a 2 KO load COMBO Card Number of Digital I/O 16 points (input or output) Digital Input Current Sinking: Active low - 1.5 mA min Current Sourcing: Active high - 1.5 mA min Digital Output Current Sinking: Active low, 200 mA max/channel Current Sourcing: Active high, 200 mA max/channel Current Max: 750 mA per 6 DO Analog Input 8 single-ended points (4 in differential mode) 14 bit Range (-10 to +10V) Analog Output 2 differential points 12 bit Range (-10 to +10V) 5mA/channel into a 2 KO load

Exterior Dimensions
Width 4.250 in (10.8 cm)
Depth 4.000 in (10.2 cm)
Height 4.250 in (10.8 cm)
Weight 3 lb (1 kg)
